interface.name: MultivariateDifferentiableFunction
interface.javadoc:
Extension of {@link MultivariateFunction} representing a multivariate differentiable real function.
$Id: MultivariateDifferentiableFunction.java 1462496 2013-03-29 14:56:08Z psteitz $
3.1

Compute the value for the function at the given point.
point Point at which the function must be evaluated.
the function value for the given point.
MathIllegalArgumentException if {@code point} does not satisfy the function's constraints (wrong dimension, argument out of bound, or unsupported derivative order for example)
